overview: JoÃ«lle Brun de Pontet was a teacher in French and Spanish, then head of the foreign languages department, in several American colleges. She then joined McGraw Hill (1970-1972), and after that Carl Byoir&ass as PR and customer relation assistant (1972-1974), before integrating Naftomar Shipping & Trading co as assistant, in charge with contracts follow-up (1975-1986).
